assessmentSentences.englishSentence: My name is Anna.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Меня зовут Анна.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I have a dog.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: У меня есть собака.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I live in Moscow.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я живу в Москве.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She likes coffee.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она любит кофе.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: It is 3 o'clock in the afternoon.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Сейчас 3 часа дня.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I work in the office every day.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я работаю в офисе каждый день.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Yesterday I went to the cinema.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Вчера я ходил в кино.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She is cooking dinner now.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она сейчас готовит ужин.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I am going to learn Spanish.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я собираюсь учить испанский язык.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: He has more books than me.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: У него больше книг, чем у меня.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I have lived here for five years.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я живу здесь уже пять лет.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: If it rains, we will stay at home.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Если пойдет дождь, мы останемся дома.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: He said that he would come tomorrow.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Он сказал, что придет завтра.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: This film was directed by a famous director.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Этот фильм был снят известным режиссером.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I would like to go on vacation in summer.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я бы хотел поехать в отпуск летом.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: By the time we arrived, the movie had already started.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: К тому времени, как мы приехали, фильм уже начался.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: If I had known about it earlier, I would have called you.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Если бы я знал об этом раньше, я бы позвонил тебе.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: He offered to help us with the move.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Он предложил помочь нам с переездом.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Despite the difficulties, they continued working.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Несмотря на трудности, они продолжили работу.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The painting is believed to have been created in the 18th century.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Считается, что эта картина была написана в 18 веке.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: No sooner had he finished his speech than the audience burst into applause.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Едва он закончил свою речь, как аудитория разразилась аплодисментами.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She insisted that we reconsider our decision.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она настояла на том, чтобы мы пересмотрели наше решение.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The government ought to have foreseen the economic implications of this policy.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Правительство должно было бы предвидеть экономические последствия этой политики.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: However convincing his arguments may be, they do not change the facts.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Сколь бы ни были убедительны его аргументы, они не меняют фактов.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: It was suggested that the new measures might contribute to economic growth.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Было высказано предположение, что новые меры могли бы способствовать росту экономики.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: What time do you usually wake up?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: В какое время ты обычно просыпаешься?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: There are five people in my family.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: В моей семье пять человек.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I don't like spicy food.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я не люблю острую еду.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: We usually go shopping on Saturdays.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Обычно мы ходим за покупками по субботам.
assessmentSentences.grammarTopic: Present Simple with adverbs of frequency

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She has been working here since January.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она работает здесь с января.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: You should take an umbrella in case it rains.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Тебе следует взять зонт на случай, если пойдет дождь.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The report, which was published last week, contains important findings.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Отчет, который был опубликован на прошлой неделе, содержит важные выводы.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Had I known you were coming, I would have prepared dinner.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Если бы я знал, что ты придешь, я бы приготовил ужин.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Do you speak English?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Ты говоришь по-английски?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She is from Russia.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она из России.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: This is my brother.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Это мой брат.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: They are students.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Они студенты.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Where is the bathroom?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Где находится ванная комната?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I want a cup of tea.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я хочу чашку чая.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She has long hair.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: У нее длинные волосы.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: We eat breakfast at 8 o'clock.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Мы завтракаем в 8 часов.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Can you help me, please?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Можешь мне помочь, пожалуйста?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: How old are you?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Сколько тебе лет?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I was at the party last night.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я был на вечеринке вчера вечером.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She didn't come to work yesterday.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она не пришла на работу вчера.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Are you watching this movie?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Ты смотришь этот фильм?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: He's taller than his brother.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Он выше своего брата.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: We are going to visit our grandparents next weekend.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Мы собираемся навестить бабушку и дедушку в следующие выходные.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I sometimes read books before bedtime.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я иногда читаю книги перед сном.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Did you enjoy the concert?
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Тебе понравился концерт?

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She was playing piano when I called.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она играла на пианино, когда я позвонил.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: This is the best restaurant in town.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Это лучший ресторан в городе.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I'm too tired to go out tonight.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я слишком устал, чтобы выйти сегодня вечером.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I've never been to Paris before.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я никогда раньше не был в Париже.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: When I arrived, she had already left.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Когда я пришел, она уже ушла.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She suggested going to the beach.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она предложила пойти на пляж.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: We'll be late unless we leave now.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Мы опоздаем, если не уйдем сейчас.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I wish I could speak Chinese.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Жаль, что я не могу говорить по-китайски.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The project must be completed by Friday.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Проект должен быть завершен к пятнице.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She asked me not to tell anyone about it.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она попросила меня никому об этом не рассказывать.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I'm used to getting up early.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я привык вставать рано.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: We might go to the concert if we can get tickets.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Мы, возможно, пойдем на концерт, если сможем достать билеты.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I've been studying English for three years.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я изучаю английский уже три года.
assessmentSentences.grammarTopic: Present Perfect Continuous with time expressions

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Not only did she win the competition, but she also set a new record.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она не только выиграла соревнование, но и установила новый рекорд.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The play, which was written by a local author, received excellent reviews.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Пьеса, которая была написана местным автором, получила отличные отзывы.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She claims to have met the president personally.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Она утверждает, что лично встречалась с президентом.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Should you need any assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Если вам понадобится помощь, пожалуйста, не стесняйтесь обращаться к нам.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: We were given the opportunity to present our research.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Нам предоставили возможность представить наше исследование.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Having finished the project, they celebrated their success.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Завершив проект, они отпраздновали свой успех.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: It's high time we made a decision.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Давно пора нам принять решение.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: I'd rather you didn't tell him about our conversation.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Я бы предпочел, чтобы ты не рассказывал ему о нашем разговоре.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The book, whose author won the Nobel Prize, has been translated into 30 languages.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Книга, автор которой получил Нобелевскую премию, была переведена на 30 языков.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: He regrets not having studied harder at school.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Он сожалеет, что не учился усерднее в школе.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Were it not for his help, we would never have succeeded.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Если бы не его помощь, мы бы никогда не добились успеха.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Seldom have I seen such a magnificent performance.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Редко я видел такое великолепное выступление.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: She is thought to have been living abroad for the past decade.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Считается, что она живет за границей последние десять лет.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Not until the final paragraph does the author reveal the true meaning.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Только в последнем абзаце автор раскрывает истинный смысл.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Little did they know what consequences their actions would have.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Мало ведали они, какие последствия будут иметь их действия.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The director, along with the cast members, is reviewing the script.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Режиссер вместе с актерами просматривает сценарий.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Had he been more careful, the accident might not have happened.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Если бы он был более осторожен, аварии могло бы не произойти.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: So profound was her insight that it changed the entire field of research.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Настолько глубоким было ее понимание, что оно изменило всю область исследований.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: The committee recommended that he be appointed to the position immediately.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Комитет рекомендовал, чтобы его немедленно назначили на эту должность.

assessmentSentences.englishSentence: Under no circumstances is the information to be disclosed to third parties.
assessmentSentences.russianTranslation: Ни при каких обстоятельствах информация не должна раскрываться третьим лицам.
